description:
There are five other designer children besides Teppei.  To stop one of them, Jin, from awakening, the Midsummer Knights go to Odaiba, where he is working as a dealer.  "In the end, I can never hold anything in my hand," he says.  Isolated from his friends, he regrets the choices he`s made in life.  Just then Amarock and Moko appear.  Moko`s kiss awakens him to his full power as a planetary gear, and he smiles an evil smile.
Source: crunchyroll
